Fun and exciting game. Love the graphics, sound effects, and realism. Could use a more kind community, and better banning system.

This is my opinion only, as a "veteran" CS player... this game is far far away from its origins, the main gamemode has to be unlocked, the others are casual at finest, some bugs still exist after 11 years of that engine... 

Again, IMHO, even CSS when launched (beta, only one skin each side) was better than this, and that was more than a decade ago...
